docs.snippet: General Manoel Cerquiera Daltro, Federal Interventor for the State of Rio Grande do Sul, advised the Ministry of War today he had "commenced to gather war material" distributed by the resigned government of Jose Antonio Flores da Cunha and "the...
docs.lead_paragraph: General Manoel Cerquiera Daltro, Federal Interventor for the State of Rio Grande do Sul, advised the Ministry of War today he had "commenced to gather war material" distributed by the resigned government of Jose Antonio Flores da Cunha and "the entire State is tranquil."

headline.main: BRAZIL STATE IS QUIET; Rio Grande do Sul Now Tranquil, New Interventor Reports

docs.snippet: Miss Julia F. Deane, social and temperance worker before her retirement in 1933, died today in the Sherman Hospital. Miss Deane was born in Elgin seventy years ago.

docs.snippet: Following negotiations with the Foreign Bondholders Protective Council, Inc., of New York, Jose Richling, Minister of Uruguay to the United States, announced yesterday that arrangements were being made to offer to holders of the outstanding 6 and 7...
docs.lead_paragraph: Following negotiations with the Foreign Bondholders Protective Council, Inc., of New York, Jose Richling, Minister of Uruguay to the United States, announced yesterday that arrangements were being made to offer to holders of the outstanding 6 and 7 per cent dollar bonds of the city of Montevideo -rights to convert them into bonds of the Republic of Uruguay.
docs.abstract: Plans to exch bonds for Repub of Uruguay bonds

headline.main: URUGUYAN BOND PLAN; Exchange of Republic Issues for Montevideo Loans Proposed

docs.snippet: Mutiny, murder, strikes, desertions and a drowning marked the three months' cruise of the steamer Algic, an 8,000-ton government-owned freighter which docked here yesterday, it was reported today by Captain Joseph Gainard.

docs.snippet: On charges that he plotted a revolt of State forces in Rio Grande do Sul, the former commander of the Rio Grande do Sul military brigade, Colonel Joao Canabarro was ar rested today. Captain Jose deMoura also was seized.

docs.snippet: A fly ing caravan of women, ardent ad vocates of peace, will leave Wash ington next Saturday for the start of a six-week cruise of South Amer ican republics to stimulate the movement for ratification of the treaties approved by the Inter American...
docs.lead_paragraph: A fly ing caravan of women, ardent ad vocates of peace, will leave Wash ington next Saturday for the start of a six-week cruise of South Amer ican republics to stimulate the movement for ratification of the treaties approved by the Inter American Conference for the Main tenance of Peace at Buenos Aireslast December.
